argument.description: The hexademical value to convert to a raw value.

returnType: The HEXTORAW function returns a raw value.
description: The Oracle/PLSQL HEXTORAW function converts a hexadecimal value into a raw value.
sample:
HEXTORAW('45D')
Result: '045D'  (as a raw value)

HEXTORAW('7E')
Result: '7E'    (as a raw value)
